biotools.summary: Provides an interface  to a growing collection of databases implementing the BioMart software suite, that is a database portal formed by dozens of biological databases spanning genomics, protemics, model organisms, cancer data, ontology information and more. The package enables retrieval of large amounts of data in a uniform way without the need to know the underlying database schemas or write complex SQL queries.

bioschemas.name: biomaRt
